description: The provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies.
full_summary:
# Temporary Help Services - Manitoba
### Notice Number: WS4244073460-Doc4283608314
### Closing Date and Time: 2023-11-15 14:00:00
#### Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
You are invited to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) process for Temporary Help Services, serving federal government departments and agencies in Manitoba. The resultant Standing Offers will be issued to qualified Offerors and will be valid from December 1, 2023, to May 31, 2024, with the possibility of a one-year extension.

### Objective
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) seeks to acquire Temporary Help Services to support federal government departments and agencies in Manitoba. This RFSA process aims to issue multiple Standing Offers to qualified Offerors, with the possibility of extensions.

### Background
Eligible suppliers are invited to submit their RFSA bids electronically through the secure online platform, CanadaBuys, and through Ariba Discovery. The RFSA process includes solicitation documents and Bid Evaluation Criteria.

### Eligibility and Requirements
Only businesses who have Internet connectivity and are eligible under the Industrial and Commercial Development Act (ICDA) and Canada Basic Book requirements are invited to participate.

### Mandatory Documents
As part of this RFSA process, suppliers must submit the following:

* A completed RFSA form
* Valid Business Registration number
* Payment information

### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Response quotation form
* Capabilities, Credentials and Related Services (including a Bidder Acknowledgement Form)
* History, References and Past Performance Evaluation Form (this form will only be dealt with if the Committee has determined that the Bid is one of the three remaining for Award or Rejection of any DDO following Negotiations)

### Contracting Entity Contact Information
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) can be contacted for further information:

* Name: Perrin, Melanie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17867554?extsite=MTc4Njc1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Consistently with Canadian federal contracting requirements, it will promote the development of Canadian businesses and award to the best Offer that combines
